sentences.en: 14 per cent of primate species are highly endangered.
sentences.cn: 14%的灵长类物种处于高度濒危状态。

sentences.en: 14 percent of primate species are highly endangered.
sentences.cn: 14%的灵长类物种处于高度濒危状态。

sentences.en: All subspecies of the tiger have been declared endangered.
sentences.cn: 所有老虎的亚种已经被宣布濒危。

sentences.en: How many jobs should be sacrificed in order to protect endangered wildlife?
sentences.cn: 为了拯救濒危野生动物应该牺牲多少就业机会?

sentences.en: However, it holds six language families, two of which have only one remaining language, and almost all of the languages here are endangered.
sentences.cn: 然而，它拥有六个语族，其中两个语族仅剩下一种语言，而且这儿几乎所有的语言都濒临灭绝。

sentences.en: I could guess that his admirable behaviour had endangered our throats.
sentences.cn: 我想他那可敬的行为多半已经危及了我们脑袋的安全.

sentences.en: I think our government should punish those people severely who kill the rare animals. It is our duty to protect the endangered animals.
sentences.cn: 我认为政府应该严厉惩罚那些捕杀稀有动物的人。保护濒临灭绝的动物是我们的责任。

sentences.en: I think there are many endangered animals in the world, such as tigers and pandas.
sentences.cn: 我认为有许多濒临灭绝的动物，如老虎和大熊猫，在世界。

sentences.en: Poison gas blew off and endangered the lives of hundreds of persons.
sentences.cn: 毒气喷出来,危及几百人的生命.

sentences.en: Ruth's life was endangered by cancerous cells at large in her body.
sentences.cn: 露丝体内已经有癌细胞扩散,生命岌岌可危.

sentences.en: Serbia would not accept such a decision, and the dynasty would be endangered.
sentences.cn: 塞尔维亚不能接受这样的决策, 而且这会危及王朝.

sentences.en: The giant panda has become an endangered species.
sentences.cn: 大熊猫已成了一种濒临灭绝的动物.

sentences.en: The health of our children is being endangered by exhaust fumes.
sentences.cn: 我们孩子们的健康正受到排放出的废气的损害。

sentences.en: The oil spill endangered thousands of birds.
sentences.cn: 石油的溢泄危及成千上万的鸟儿.

sentences.en: The Salvation Army has worked in the big cities to keep endangered young people out of a life of crime.
sentences.cn: 救世军已经在大城市展开行动，努力使那些处于危险边缘的年轻人远离犯罪。

sentences.en: The sea turtle is an endangered speices (=it may soon no longer exist)
sentences.cn: 中文例句: 海龟是濒临物种

sentences.en: These endangered gentle giants are highly social animals.
sentences.cn: 这些濒临灭绝的、性情温顺的大型动物属于高度群居的动物。

sentences.en: This island is maintained as a sanctuary for endangered species.
sentences.cn: 那个岛继续作为濒危物种的保护区.

trans.tran_cn: （动物、鸟类等）濒危的，濒于灭绝的
